title: For sale or trade: T205 Ira Thomas PSA 3.5

posts.post_title: For sale or trade: T205 Ira Thomas PSA 3.5
posts.post_content:
I picked up a 5.5, so my 3.5 is extra. For sale at $30 plus shipping, or I will accept a trade of a 3 or better T205 that I don't have.

Private message me, I can send a photo, haven't been able to figure it out here yet



SOLD
